kaluthara disthrikkaye ‘ee’ saha ‘bi’ shreniwalata ayath siyaluma marga kapat kara sanwardhanaya kirime yodha sanwardhana wyapathiyak janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage upades pita mahamarga sanwardhana niyojya amathi nirmala kothalawala mahathage pradhanathwayen agalawaththa, yala saha horana yana sthanawaladi aarambha wuni.kaluthara disthrikkaye margawala kilo mitar 473k labana wasara mada bhagaya wana wita awasan kirimata salasum ha asthamenthu kara athayi niyojya amathi nirmala kothalawala mahatha kiweya.samanyayen mulu marga paddhathiyama sanwardhanaya kirimedi kabinat pathrika anumathiya awashya bawath disthrik marga sanwardhana adhikariyata ee sandaha kabinat anumathiyakin thorawa yojitha sama margayakma kilo mitar 5 bagin sanwardhanaya kirimata tendar anumathiya laba gatha haki bawin ee ayurin meya sidukirima kalgatha nokara itukara gatha haki margayak bawin ema prathipaththiya kriyathmaka kara athi bawath ee mahatha kiweya.agalawaththe sita ballapitiya dakwa kilo mitar 23 sita 28 dakwa kilo mitar 05k sandaha rupiyal miliyana 125kda kirimatiya sita yala dakwa kilo mitar 12 sita 17.6 dakwa kilo mitar 5k sandaha rupiyal miliyana 136.7k da, horana sita aluthgama dakwa kilo mitar 5 sandaha rupiyal miliyana 150 k da rajayen waya karanu labana bawa kaluthara marga sanwardhana injineru karyalaye usas niladhariniyak kiwaya.me marga kaluthara disthrikkaye wisheshayen wanija nagara ha dadi samipathawak athi, esema wishala washayen rathawahana prawahanaya wana dakunu palathata prawesha marga hatiyata handunagena athi disthrikkaye pradhanathama margawe..
